title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Then there was that giant fish lost near Dryburgh by Colonel Haig ofBemersyde, "perhaps the greatest salmon ever hooked in Tweed," as SirHerbert Maxwell remarks in his _Story of the Tweed_.

title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Then there was that giant fish lost near Dryburgh by Colonel Haig ofBemersyde, "perhaps the greatest salmon ever hooked in Tweed," as SirHerbert Maxwell remarks in his _Story of the Tweed_.

title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: And in all the later wars they took their share--Scotts ofBuccleuch, Haigs of Bemersyde, Erskines, Grants, and Kilpatricks.
